name: Custom Minesweeper (aidan guy)
description:
Classic minesweeper that features several changeable properties which include:

  • Height and width of the board
  • Amount of mines on the board
  • Amount of lives
  • Amount of flags
  • And more

Other features include:

  • A camera that can move around and zoom in and out
  • Save and load feature
  • (Almost) Limitless board size customization

Saves will overwrite each other. Saving, loading, and starting very large games will take quite a while. The timer may be inaccurate with larger games (it is tied to the room speed), so if you are timing yourself I would use a third-party timer.

There may be several unknown bugs, as I am not the most experienced programmer.

I will probably not be fixing many bugs or adding anything major to the game in the foreseeable future, as I wish to pursue other projects; however, I may or may not respond to a few bug reports or ideas in the comments.

Made with GameMaker Studio 2.
